message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I think it's a great deal for a product you'll get a lot of value from.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. How about we aim for $85?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my initial price.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value I see in the product, would $87 be within your consideration range?
